Let's build the future of health

All wearable data, one API

Our API offers one access point to wearable data from across the globe and all major wearable devices. No need to manage your own API integrations. Let us ensure access to wearable data is seamless and secure.

Enabling all companies to build solutions on health data

Konnect helps all companies build health, fitness and wellness solutions by making it easy, safe and reliable for developers to connect their users' health data to apps and services.
